name: chat-app
description: Whispyr is a real-time chat application built with the **MERN stack**, **Zustand**, **DaisyUI**, **Tailwind CSS**, **Toast**, **Socket.IO**, and **Vite**.   It supports instant messaging with authentication, media upload via Cloudinary, and a clean, responsive interface.

scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
